tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.16
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayFIELD False output_data_A $output_data_A output_data_B $output_data_B name SAGA.shapes_tools.16 SHAPES $SHAPES FIELD $FIELD PERCENT $PERCENT EXACT $EXACT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_A $OutputSection_A.outputType_A transmissionMode_A $OutputSection_A.transmissionMode_A outputType_B $OutputSection_B.outputType_B transmissionMode_B $OutputSection_B.transmissionMode_B

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Categories
param.help: Categories The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_A
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_A
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_B
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_B
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Randomly splits one layer into to two new layers. Useful to create a control group for model testing. Optionally this can be done category-wise if a category field is specified.
